page.name: Hi, I'm Steven.
page.descriptionw: Full Stack Developer with 8 months of experience in FullStack development, graduated in Computer Engineering from ITCR.
page.descriptionw1: For the last 8 months, I have been immersed in the programming world, working with technologies such as C#, .NET, SQL Server, React, JavaScript, HTML and CSS. And training in Python and Java languages.
page.motivation: I am passionate about creating innovative and functional solutions.

projects.title: K√°mien Costa Rica
projects.description: I am part of an independent project with K√°mien Costa Rica, an online store with original items. Guaranteed authenticity and imports directly from USA. I am giving maintenance, redesign and development of new website features for the purchase of products through Whatsapp.
projects.description2: This project is an application to use and reinforce my knowledge in Next used typescript and Tailwind css with API's, the use and good practices of web developer importance in Backend and Frontend from the video offered by freecodecamp: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KkC_wYM_Co4.
